lead_paragraph: Alan Webb, the American record-holder in the mile, will run his first race of the year March 15 in the Central Park Challenge, the New York Road Runners announced. The race will also serve as the United States 8-kilometer men’s championship. The Road Runners said a women’s 8K (4.97 miles) invitational race for top American and international runners would precede the men’s race. The total prize money will be at least $70,000, plus $10,000 to anyone who establishes a United States 8K record.
